The patients are in safe hands of doctor who cares patients excellently with ultimate care as well as make family member tension free and happy.  Here utmost priority is given to patients  for treatment with least importance to fee and charges. Simply we are in safest hands of doctors during treatment like GOD cares all of us.
Special thanks to Dr Shree Naman Vora Sir, Dr Manali Ma'am and Dr Sherin Ma'am including entire staff and reception team who are very helpful and polite.
Thank you all and Hats off to Vora Dental Clinic

He is as courteous as all others in this dispensary . I saw him for the first time . I felt same warmth with him as with rest of the staff . 

I liked him saying the success possibility is 70.% . I am sure such candid feed back , that too after his consulting his experienced brother is rare in industry and rare in modern materialistic world . I trust this gentleman , his feedback and organization.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I would like to share my overall experience about my treatment at Dr. Vora‚Äôs clinic. I had gaps in my teeth. The major one was in upper front row teeth. I was very uncomfortable with it for several years. I knew that putting braces could be an option however I was not comfortable with the braces either.. was concerned about how I would look with it..

 

I came to know about Dr. Vora‚Äôs clinic when I was searching for braces treatment on internet. It was one of the options I checked. When I met Dr. Naman Vora first time, he took all my worries away. He explained me the different treatments they had to fix my dental problem. He advised me to go for lingual braces treatment which was perfect for me since the braces are fixed to the back of your teeth and they are not visible while you talk or smile.

 

Cost of the treatment:

Before visiting Dr. Vora‚Äôs clinic I had visited few more doctors and understood various treatments available. The cost of the treatment at Dr. Vora‚Äôs clinic was the lowest among all the clinics I visited. But the quality of treatment was not compromised at all..

 

***** *** ***** ********* ***** ** ** ** ****** *** ************* ** *** ****** *** ***** **** ** he is very nice human being, very friendly and caring person. It happens (perhaps with many of us) that when you talk to your doctor, half of your problems go away. With Dr. Naman I have strongly experienced this right from my first visit. He made me very comfortable, all of my queries were addressed properly every time.

 

Results of treatment:

It will not be an exaggeration if I say that this treatment has changed my life. My confidence level used to be low because of the big gap between front row teeth. I had never thought that with the braces treatment the gaps can be completely closed. The results were visible from 1st or 2nd week of treatment only and obviously I was very happy and excited to see that. After my treatment was over I changed my job also and moved to technical sales where I had to visit customers, travel, make presentations. I am sure, without this treatment I would not have been comfortable and confident to visit different people, make presentations etc. The treatment brought lot of positive changes in my life and this magic was done by Dr. Naman.

 

I am truly grateful to Dr. Naman Vora..
reply_text:
Thank you rahul for your valuable feedback ,
It really amazes me that how simple teeth alignment and space closure have such a humongous impact in someone‚Äôs life.
Wish you all success and Happyness in life

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dear Dr. Naman Vora

I am writing to express my sincere gratitude for the exceptional dental care I've received under your expertise since 2020. Having struggled with malalignment issues, I am truly appreciative of the meticulous efforts you've taken to address my concerns without resorting to a single tooth extraction.

Your commitment to preserving my natural teeth while effectively treating malalignment has not only demonstrated your skill but also showcased a deep understanding of my concerns and preferences. The personalized care and attention to detail I've experienced throughout the treatment journey have been nothing short of remarkable.

Your professionalism, coupled with the welcoming atmosphere of your practice, has made each visit a positive and reassuring experience. I feel compelled to acknowledge not only the outstanding results but also the compassionate approach that sets your practice apart.

Thank you, Dr. Vora, for transforming my dental health and instilling confidence in my smile. I wholeheartedly appreciate your dedication to preserving oral health with a patient-centric focus. I will gladly recommend your services to others seeking top-notch dental care.

Warm regards,

Pranali Sawant

*** ** *** **** ******* ** ***** ***** Both my daughters are under his treatment - ceramic braces. He is very professional and explains the entire treatment procedure. The clinic is very clean and all his staff including the other assistant doctors are extremely professional. Would also like to highlight the reception services- too too good. The two ladies handling the reception services r so apt for their job, have never seen such professionalism in any of the other clinics/hospital I visited earlier. Would definitely recommend the Vora Dental clinic to all my acquaintances.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fluorosis,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Deep Cleaning,Smile Design,
review: I visited Dr. Vora's clinic for general consultation as I was having foul breathe and stained teeth (mainly due to enamel flurosis). Upon my visit, I was positively surprised with the safety arrangements in light of covid - specially designed dress,  mouth wash and other aspects. Dr. Darshan saw my x-ray and did physical examination with utmost care. He then recommended for molar extractions, deep cleaning and smile design (only if I wanted to get rid of the stained teeth). My treatment plan was explained to me in a detailed and transparent manner. Post that I visited the clinic 4-5 times for different treatment and each treatment was done by the specialist of that area. I must say that my experience with each of the Doctors was simply amazing. Beside good doctors, they were extremely humane and polite in the behavior. They explained everything before they actually did the same. The devices and equipments used were all best in class. What I liked the most about the treatment was that all the three doctors who were working on my case were completely in sync and each of them knew what other has done..and ensured that long-term solution is provided to me for my dental care. Also, I was constantly contacted by Dr. Darshan himself to check how I was doing. Net net, * ***** **** ** *** *** **** ****** ****** *** ********* **** **** ** ****** ************* ****** ** ******* ** ***** ****** ******** ** * ********* *** *********** ******. I highly recommend Dr. Vora for any dental treatment/ concerns.

First of all, thank you to Dr. Naman Vora. I had my invisible aligner treatment done from Dr. Naman Vora. I hesitated and always feared to get the treatment.
But thanks to the amazing followups and treatment by them, i didnt feel any pain or any difficulties at all. It is so much better and hassle free than the traditional braces that generally used! 
Generally,  women after their 50‚Äôs hesitate to take this treatment but trust me it is just one step away make your dental health.
They have a good professional team which does their best for your comfort and proper treatment. 
Very happy and satisfied with the treatment, and i‚Äôve got the perfect New Smile that i always desired!‚ò∫Ô∏è

My teeth are straight and the end result is pretty much as predicted. I‚Äôve had an amazing experience with Invisalign so far, the aligners are very unnoticable and haven‚Äôt really changed the way I do things and it‚Äôs a very painless treatment.At the beginning it may feel a little uncomfortable but after 2 days it feel normal.I would suggest this treatment as it a painless and effective treatment.Thanks to dr Naman Vora for this amazing treatment

I am 38 and my child is 12 , we both started braces treatment about 10 months back  from Dr. Naman Vora by reading reviews about him and his clinic Dr. Voras dental care, mulund.
I would strongly recommend him and his team and this wonderful holistic Dental set up for all dental needs.

Advantages of braces treatment with dr. Naman Vora is firstly he is very frank about his treatment options and it was explained very nicely , he has got more than 15 years of experience and has treated more than 2000 patients with braces (he has got all the treatment record of his patient since 15 years)
He is available at mulund centre 3 days a week as oppose to many other clinic where braces specialist visits once a month.
He is well versed with latest techniques and offers the best option in braces available .......so I would strongly recommend him for smile enhancement with braces at any age.
Thank you dr. Naman Vora.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
It has been 7-8 yrs now I know Dr Voras Dental Clinic.
I had root canal treatment and implant done.
Thanks to Dr Darshan Vora and all the assistants for the above treatments. The team has been helpful and gentle throughout the process.
And now I'm consulting Dr Naman Vora for braces. Since I have an impacted canine he gave me all the possible solutions also answered all my questions(same questions asked multiple times) very patiently. Looking forward with the treatment, very nervous and scared but I'm sure everything will be fine.

I recommend you to this clinic as the Doctors and staff are very professional. Also, the clinic is very hygenic and under one roof you get all the dental treatment done

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Naman Vora is the most soft spoken and least scary orthodontist i have met. He is very professional and works with great precision. He took out time to show results from his past successful similar cases of Braces. And explained all the modern options of treatment available. Ranging from cost efficient ones to best aesthetics wise. He also gives you a clear picture of how long your treatment might last and it's expected result outcomes. To sum it up, i would definitely recommend you guys to go to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Naman Vora is an excellent and experienced dentist. He understood my case really well and suggested me orthodontic treatment accordingly. I am done with the treatment now and  it was a wonderful experience. I‚Äôm in love with my smile now! All thanks to Dr. Naman!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I strongly recommend Dr. Naman Vora and his team for his excellence in aligners. I started my treatment with him in the month of August 2022 for tooth gap and within 10 months I‚Äôve got the best results with a perfect smile. The entire process was well supervised, easy and pain free with regular timely check-ups. I‚Äôm glad I visited him for my treatment.

I had visited Dr. Vora's clinic for implant issue initially but also wished for better alignment of my teeths.. Dr.  Naman advised such a good idea that we could never thought with invisalign treatment. I am forever grateful to both the doctors, i am now implant free with beautiful smile. I would definitely recommend anyone facing any dental issues to visit this clinic for a healthy advise and i am sure you wont regret! Thank you so much doc Naman and Darshan and keep up the great work!!

Doctor explained all the dental hygiene to be done after braces fixing and the consequences for not doing the same . This has helped my daughter to take care of her teeth after braces fixing
Every time he checks whether she is doing the procedure well which is appreciated 
I like his approach towards his patients

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was much worried before going to the clinic. But as soon as  doctor talked  with me with drawing and  explanation about the easy procedure,  I  was fine. Then the decayed  tooth was removed with latest instrument. It didn't pain. I am very much thankful to Dr. Vora. Actually me  and  my husband both had taken treatment from their father  Dr. Hiralal Vora  also.

Honestly disappointed!  I'm a regular at Vora and yes wait times are always an issue but i didn't mind as i really liked the experience with the treatment. This time was quite disappointing as i was called at 8pm and more than an hour and more later i was told sorry the tooth tattoo stones are not in stock so can't do today.... I would have appreciated if this was checked before the appointment or atleast when i came so save me the time that i spent there.

review: Good doctor. He is very simple and gentle in his behavior. He will give sufficient time to each patient.
Dr.naman Vora is good he is friendly with all .He explains all the process of the treatment. He recommends the pain killers and the oilment for relief from pain.

** ***** **** ** **** *** ********** ***** ****** ********* *** ******* ******** **** . I am from Bihar and I use to come mumbai after every 3 months for new alinger sets and attachments . My appointment are never  pre-booked i use to just informed dr NAMAN vora and he always manage my appointments never waited too long even in his busy appointment seduals  .sir is very humble explains every steps, make u fell comfortable and whole team of dr NAMAN VORA are good . It was a healing experience ..my teeth were crooked at some areas that I always had to smile with lips closed but now after the braces treatment they are just  aligned so well that i can smile without any hesitation ..overall the staff is also polite but *sometimes* the wait time for him is more..but the  awesome clinic ambience takes care of that..the doctor is also friendly and explains the issue very well..moreover one can discuss with him about the issue freely ..so I am grateful to Naman Sir and would definitely recommend him.

Sunday I attended doctor. Doctor cared and ensured less pain given to patient. Extra molar growth reduced by grinding its edges instead of extraction of molar which is good. review:
As someone who was petrified of dentists since I was a child, Dr . Naman Vora's clinic has proved my perceptions of a scary dentist to be wrong. 
Not only is he a very reliable, *** ************* ******, but a very warm and amiable individual.

Very good. Professional approach. Gave sufficient time to explain us and answered our all the queries. Specially Child was more comfortable with him and the clinic. Very reasonable compared to services. Even after treatment guidance is very good. This was the first seating. Let's see how it happens over period of one year, till end of full treatment.

Hi, let me start by thanking Dr vora and entire team .Treatment standards here are at par with USA.Front  desk and support staff are very polite and they make you feel very comfortable. 
I was treated with aligners and surprisingly the fees is very reasonable considering treatment standards.

Awesome , during all of my tooth treatment I didn't find any discomfort, my treatment was complete with easy. All the Dr help me to be as comfortable as I was at home . I thanks all the Dr for that. Everyone is brilliant. Thank you very much to feel me better and give freedom from all the pain . thank you
